column5: wondering if anyone knows answer i bought my anterless deer tag last night at bass pro not sure how to enter draw i went to outdoors card site and started to do what customer service said buts it wants to re tag off credit card anyone have answer
What you bought was a buck tag and to get your antlerless oppurtunity sticker go to SERVICE ONTARIO with the section you wish to hunt and they will date stamp it and send it to the ministry proper

you can only apply for the antler-less tag by going online to ontario.ca/outdoorscard , phone it in to 1-800-288-1155 or go to service ontario and do it in person. the mnr eliminated the mail in application this year.
